links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1).
mathematica: a={};b=4;c=30;AppendTo[a, b];AppendTo[a, c];Do[b=b+c;AppendTo[a, b];c=b+c;AppendTo[a, c], {n, 4!}];a (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 18 2008 *)LinearRecurrence[{1,1},{4,30},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 16 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(4 + 26*x)/(1 - x - x^2), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 17 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[4,30]; [n le 2 select I[n] else Self(n-1) + Self(n-2): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 17 2012
